name: Primavera Pizzeria
address: 761 Morris Park Ave, Bronx, NY 10462, USA

reviews.text: The Owner is amazing! He makes a helluva lunch special

Very clean
Delicious pizza
Great service
All the food looks fantastic
Fantastic local pizzeria. Excellent $10 lunch specials. A local favorite.

Pizzeria Primavera has amazing pizza ‚Äì fresh, hot, and full of flavor. The place is spotless and very well kept, which makes the dining experience even better. They even gave us complimentary sweet bread, which was a really nice touch and absolutely delicious. Definitely a spot worth coming back to!
Chicken Roll a must have.
The pizza was hot and thin. The sauce was not sweet. Just enough cheese for pullüòä It was amazing. I will be visiting again and again.
Best pizza around love it definitely coming back aging
Pizza was okay, only reason I'll never go back is because of the old man, he is very rude and cranky. No manners, 1st time and the last time
Excelente servicio y precios muy econ√≥micos

Terrible Margherita Pizza. I taste more bread than anything on this pizza. Better yet, this is not even a real margherita pizza and doesn‚Äôt even taste like one. Tastes more like a Sicilian school lunch pizza. Never getting this again.
Great crispy cheese pizza slice

Pizza was delivered hot and fast. Very good pizza . Huge slices and value for $$. I'll be ordering again. If you dont like seasoned slightly salty pizza this may not be for . I love it bc i didn't have to add anything but oregano .
La pizza estaba buen√≠sima y era muy grande, excelente servicio y el lugar estaba bien limpio
IMO the best pizza in the Van Nest neighborhood
Muy bu3na comida
Great food and great staff

I've been in New York for a about a year now and haven't had understood what the fuss was about when it comes to a New York pizza. Every pizza I tried till this point has been subpar. My family was visiting from Michigan and they wanted to try an authentic new york pizza and my Google search led me to this pizzeria. The pizza was incredible and Luigi was an amazing host. It felt like I was having some food at my grandpa's house. After we finished eating, he gave us some sweets and gave the kids some lollipops. Overall, I'm extremely happy that fate brought me to his shop and now I'm looking forward to my next visit.
Best pizzeria coming here for over 20 yrs
Updated 10/23/2024: they're baaack!! Good slice the way it used to be. Glad I gave them another try. Now this is how you make and flavor a NY slice. Thanks!
Sausage, white, peperoni, plain are my favorite slices.
Excellent service.. Decent prices.
The best prices and the food is delicious and staff is very friendly

Their grilled chicken with broccoli Rabe and chicken cacciatore is better than the PINES.
Definitely recommend.
Good food, friendly customer service and good prices.
The best pizza
Excellent Grilled chicken salads
Awesome spot, great affordable lunch special

Best Pizza place EVER The pizza is to die for and their salads aswell . This is my go to spot with my Husband and Kids every friday. The staff is super friendly and polite . The Owner is very friendly and welcoming . Deffinitely the best Pizza spot in the Bronx .

As good as a true NY slice gets.
If you appreciate an old traditional recipe made pizza in this section of the bronx, this will be your spot too. Enjoy
My neighborhood spot, great vibes friendly faces good eats.
Good pizza, one of the best on Morris park. One of the only reasonably priced slices on morris park.

It has Great Pizza. When I arrived I ordered me two chicken bacon slices. This is my go to. It was well made, not to mention with complementary service. Good people. An authentic Italian owned pizza shop. You can't go wrong.
The food is excellent!
I ordered a scicillian pizza and the crust is tough to eat. Also the sauce has no flavor. I won't be ordering again

Super happy this place is here! I haven't had a good slice of pizza like this in YEARS so I was definitely excited and happy about how it was. Also the longest pizza slice I've had in a while, and affordable as well. Appreciate the selection of drinks such as water, Jarritos, and soda. I probably wouldn't do a walk in again, because I reside far, but would do delivery if they're on a platform. :)

Yep, that's what you get when you ask for it to go.)
That being said, it's a pretty good slice for $2.75.
Good size.
Good flavor.
Good mix of cheese and sauce.
Thin, extremely chewy crust,
a  little too much exposed, but not enough to annoy you.
I'll give this one a 92.
Luigi sei un grande! A parte essere un bravo pizzaiolo √® una persona squisita e generosa. Un abbraccio da Alessandro e Laura. W la Calabria
Good selection of pizza, hot food, hero sandwiches

I absolutely love the pizza here. It ranks in my Top 3 for the Bronx (so far). Slices are huge, prices are right. The pizzeria is welcoming, and the staff is friendly. Oh, and their chicken rolls are the best. Hands down. You won't be disappointed stopping by here (and for those looking for a lunch special, try their special of the day).

What a lovely and extremely delicious restaurant!! Everyone there is really friendly and welcoming! The food is really, really good!! I‚Äòd even say that I‚Äòve eaten one of the best pizzas here. Also, try out their rice balls, yummy!!
The pizza is the best the food is delicious. The rice bowls are outstanding. The broccoli wrap is great. The soups are great. Everything here is really really good and well priced.

They used to be better when Luigi was every day. Lately, they're getting overpriced if you call after 7pm they charge more they do when Luigi is not around. They're not reliable and honest.  I can't trust them..‚Ä¶

I thought other pizza shops were good. But this one here beats any other pizza shop review. I have made. There Calzones. Are delicious, Very big. Lol The pizza and all other dinners a amazing. I come from California to visit family. But my first stop is here. ü§£ü§£ You really need to try it if your in the area. üíØ‚Ä¶

This pizzeria is an absolute gem! I was shocked when I decided to step away from the likes of "Anthony & Sal's" pizzeria and these over priced and lackluster pizzerias. Emilios being another culprit of false advertising. But revisiting Primavera of Morris Park was the best thing I could do! The pizza has flavor, very robust flavor! The employees are absolutely professional and courteous. I highly... Matter of fact. I implore you to order from primevera. They haven't disappointed as of far. As compared to Portnoys reviews of "Johnny's"... Absolutely horrid pizza after gaining attention and rated in 9 out of ten. Hopefully this review gives patrons of primevera and future patrons of primevera an insight of a gem of a pizzeria. Bon App√©tit!

best pizza i ever gotten this is so good for only 2.75 for a slice and btw the slice of pizza comes big and not only that the workers are so respectful and so kindly everything about this pizza place is amazing i love it and when i come back from highschool i always go here since it close to my house

We order from Primavera at least once a week and the food in really good. We also get food catered like penne, chicken wings, chicken parm, hero‚Äôs and eggplant parm. Everything is so good and never had a complaint. Everyone that works there is also so nice.
Don't go there unless you're gonna have a mushroom pizza man it was delicious I've had the white pizza also delicious they are good and I'm not really a pizza lover but it was good

Great food, but for some reason the worker was suspicious of me, either that or he was just in a bad mood.
I come here occasionally so i don't know why he was acting like that.
been going here for 10 years and never have I been disappointed!! Italian delicious pizza and more.... spaghetti and meat balls...meat loaf...pasta and meat sauce
La peor pizzeria de todo el vencindario, la peor salsa marinera, se van a repentir si compran aqui, sin mencionar las 2 hora que duran para llevarte la pizza
Quality food and great customer service, prices are very reasonable compared to other pizza places!
Really good pizza in an area filled with good pizza places. They also have the lowest prices, currently 15 dollars for a large plain pizza
Very friendly bunch of people, the owner is very nice and friendly. The food is really good I stay getting the grilled chicken afrado with broccoli üôÉüíØ‚Ä¶
Bought a pie. This is my go to pizza shop around  here. They also have a good selection of hot food already prepared for lunch. The owner is friendly.
There eggplant hero was good lot of eggplant sauce I ask for no cheese was good thank you will be back there when I'm in that neighborhood for real.
Love the pizza here,good customer service,clean space,I highly recommend!
Food is good and not overpriced. Their meatloaf is amazing.
My go-to place for pizza and the occasional pasta meal--good prices for both.
My absolute favorite pizza shop in NYC. Now that I live in Florida I make it my first stop when I get to the Bronx
